commits.name: Commit-0
commits.content:
<?php

namespace App\Http\Controllers;

use App\Http\Controllers\Controller;
use App\Models\Feedback;

class FeedbackReportController extends Controller
{
    // Display all feedbacks in the reports page
    public function index()
    {
        // Fetch all feedbacks with related user info
        $feedbacks = Feedback::with('user')
            ->orderBy('created_at', 'desc')
            ->get();

        // Pass the feedbacks to the report blade
        return view('swisa-admin.admin-reports.feedback', compact('feedbacks'));
    }
}
